content: To obtain the Samadhi Wind Agate, you need to defeat Yellow Wind Sage in Yellow Sand Formation in Yellow Wind Ridge.

To obtain the Samadhi Wind Agate, you need to defeat Yellow Wind Sage in Yellow Sand Formation in Yellow Wind Ridge.
